title: CONTAINS
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string contains any of the specified compare_strings. The comparison is case-sensitive. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The source string to search within.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to search for within the source string.

examples:
CONTAINS("Welcome to the China", "Welcome", "China")
-- Returns TRUE because the text contains "Welcome" and "China" (case-sensitive match).

CONTAINS("Welcome to the China", "welcome", "china")
-- Returns FALSE because "welcome" and "china" do not match the casing in the original text (case-sensitive comparison).

IF(CONTAINS(Product_Type__c, "part"), "Parts", "Service")
-- Returns "Parts" if Product_Type__c contains "part"; otherwise, returns "Service".
